summary: Results-driven Senior Product Manager with 8+ years of experience building and scaling B2C SaaS products for millions of users. Expert in data-driven decision making, growth optimization, and leading cross-functional teams from discovery to launch. Track record of increasing user engagement by 40%+ and driving revenue growth through innovative product features.
highlights: Grew active user base from 2M to 8M users in 2 years through strategic feature launches and growth initiatives
Led redesign of onboarding flow that improved activation rate by 45% and reduced time-to-value by 60%
Launched AI-powered recommendation engine that increased user session time by 35% and drove $3M in incremental revenue
Built and mentored team of 3 product managers while managing portfolio of 5 product streams

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
experience.description: Leading product strategy and execution for core engagement and monetization features serving 8M+ monthly active users. Managing cross-functional teams of 15+ engineers, designers, and data scientists.
achievements: Drove 120% user growth (2M to 8M MAU) by launching creator tools suite and viral sharing features
Increased average revenue per user (ARPU) by 65% through premium subscription tier and in-app purchases
Shipped AI-powered content recommendation system that boosted session time by 35% and daily active users by 28%
Led platform redesign that improved user retention (D30) from 32% to 51% and reduced churn by 40%
Established data-driven experimentation culture, running 50+ A/B tests quarterly with 85% statistical significance
Mentored 3 product managers and built product management best practices across organization

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: Owned end-to-end product development for fitness tracking and social features, working with teams of 10+ engineers and designers to launch high-impact features for 3M+ users.
achievements: Launched community challenges feature that drove 200% increase in user-generated content and 45% boost in weekly active users
Redesigned onboarding flow using Jobs-to-be-Done framework, improving activation rate from 38% to 65%
Implemented freemium to premium conversion funnel that increased paid subscribers by 85% ($2.5M ARR)
Built personalized workout recommendation engine using collaborative filtering, increasing completion rates by 52%
Led mobile app redesign that improved App Store rating from 3.8 to 4.7 stars with 10K+ reviews
Reduced customer support tickets by 35% through in-app education and improved UX

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
experience.description: Supported product development for buyer experience and search features on growing marketplace platform with 500K+ monthly transactions.
achievements: Launched smart search with autocomplete and filters, increasing search-to-purchase conversion by 32%
Implemented one-click checkout flow that reduced cart abandonment from 68% to 42%
Built seller rating and review system that increased buyer trust and boosted GMV by 25%
Conducted 40+ user interviews and usability tests to inform product roadmap and feature prioritization
Collaborated with engineering team to improve page load times by 40%, reducing bounce rate by 18%

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: Product Manager Mentor Program
projects.description: Founded mentorship program connecting experienced PMs with aspiring product professionals
highlights: Mentored 25+ junior PMs transitioning into product management
Created curriculum covering product strategy, user research, and data analytics
90% of mentees secured PM roles within 6 months

awards.title: Product Leader of the Year
awards.description: Recognized for excellence in product leadership and mentorship

awards.title: 40 Under 40 in Tech
awards.description: Featured as rising leader in technology and product innovation

publications.title: Building Growth Loops in B2C Products
From 0 to 1M Users: Lessons in Product-Market Fit
